channel.title: ::ticket
channel.description:
i saw this on pur3zscape 525
i thought it was pretty leet and would be a good addition to a 317 server.
this is how it goes someone types ::ticket if they want to talk to a mod or admin , but if you are the 6th person who typed ::ticket it would say "thank you for submitted your que, you are currently the 6th person in line " and a mod or admin types ::next and it shows whos next in line .
any ideas on how to start?

item.title: ::ticket
item.dc:creator: @srpwnz srpwnz
item.description:
@srpwnz wrote:

:0 tht will take a while i wish i could help

Read full topic

item.title: ::ticket
item.dc:creator: @_jeba `jeba
item.description:
@_jeba wrote:

Nice idea, I know it can be done because it’s just like a Pest Control timer, only activated when a player does a command.

Though multiple admins would cause a confusion for it. So I’m not sure.

Read full topic

item.title: ::ticket
item.dc:creator: @WestSideMass WestSideMass
item.description:
@WestSideMass wrote:

This wouldn’t be too easy, but it’s a good idea. You would have to make a whole system basically. Waiting in line, the commands. Good luck.

Read full topic
